title: Starting a game freezes league, sound, mouse, and crashes the computer, help.
body: For some reason, whenever I start a game of league, my game just freezes, the screen freezes, sound freezes, the mouse too, and the computer itself completely freezes, forcing me to restart the computer. This is only happening with league, I think it has to do with the last patch update, but, what do i know. Also, it doesn't crash when it's in the loading screen, just when i go in-game (for example I alt/tab out of the game before it starts, it starts, and i alt/tab in the game and it crashes. Hope somebody can help me, thank you.

replies.body: I've seen this issue happening for players who recently updated their Windows 10.  There appears to bne an issue with [Xbox Game Bar ](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) that's causing this freeze, so disabling that should get you fixed up.  Let me know if you still have issues!
It worked for me! Thank you!
I've been experiencing similar issues for the past 2 weeks (since windows update), but my dvr was allready turned off. So this didn't fix it for me.
